options.label: Add Rows
options.name: addRows
options.description: Add multiple rows to a spreadsheet

options.label: Get All Values
options.name: getAll
options.description: Get all values from a spreadsheet

options.label: Get Values By Range
options.name: getRange
options.description: Get values from cells from specified range

options.label: Update Cell
options.name: updateCell
options.description: Update single cell in a spreadsheet

options.label: Update Rows
options.name: updateRows
options.description: Update multiple rows in a spreadsheet

options.label: Clear Row
options.name: clearRow
options.description: Clear the values of a row in a spreadsheet

options.label: Clear Column
options.name: clearCol
options.description: Clear the values of a column in a spreadsheet

options.label: Clear By Range
options.name: clearRange
options.description: Clear the values in a spreadsheet from specified range

options.label: Clear All Values
options.name: clearAll
options.description: Clear all the values in a spreadsheet

inputParameters.label: Spreadsheet Name
inputParameters.name: spreadsheetName
inputParameters.description: Name of the spreadsheet to create. Default to Untitled spreadsheet.

inputParameters.label: Range
inputParameters.name: range
inputParameters.description: For example, if the spreadsheet data is: A1=1, B1=2, A2=3, B2=4, then requesting range=A1:B2, returns [[1, 2],[3, 4]]

inputParameters.label: Row Values
inputParameters.name: rowValues
inputParameters.description: For instance: [[1, 2], [3, 4]] will insert 2 new rows. FIRST row: A1=1, B1=2, and SECOND row: A2=3, B2=4

inputParameters.label: Range
inputParameters.name: range
inputParameters.description: A1 notation of the rows to update.

inputParameters.label: Row Values
inputParameters.name: rowValues
inputParameters.description: For instance: [[1, 2], [3, 4]] will update FIRST row: A1=1, B1=2, and SECOND row: A2=3, B2=4

inputParameters.label: Cell
inputParameters.name: range
inputParameters.description: A1 notation of the cell to update.

inputParameters.label: Range
inputParameters.name: range
inputParameters.description: A1 notation of the range to clear.
